snippet: The Italian automaker Fiat has raised its stake in Chrysler to 58.5 percent from 53.5 percent after Chrysler won regulatory approval for a more energy-efficient car.
abstract: The Italian automaker Fiat has raised its stake in Chrysler to 58.5 percent from 53.5 percent after Chrysler won regulatory approval for a more energy-efficient car.
lead_paragraph: The Italian automaker Fiat agreed on Thursday to increase its stake in Chrysler to 58.5 percent from 53.5 percent.
